page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING VARIES IN SIZE FROM THE 16 STOREY TOWER BLOCK BY THE RAILWAY STATION TO MANY SMALL BUNGALOWS AWAY FROM THE TOWN CENTRE.CENTRAL MARGATE HASMANY GEORGIAN ,VICTORIAN AND EDWARDIAN TERRACES.SMALL BLOCKS OF FLATS HAVE BEEN BUILT ON MILL LANE , HIGH STREET, ADDINGTON AND HAWLEY STREET TO REPLACE OLDER BUILDINGS. THE SITE BEHIND ST. JAMES CHURCH IS BEING DEVELOPED FOR FLATS NOW. THE MAINLY RESIDENTIAL AREAS OF WESTBROOK HAVE ROADS COMBINING DETACHED, SEMI-DETACHED AND BUNGALOW PROPERTIES AND THE GARLINGE AREA HAS A SECTION OF COUNCIL HOUSES.
